title: 2001/175/EC: Council Decision of 26 February 2001 appointing a Portuguese member of the Economic and Social Committee
header:
Council Decision
of 26 February 2001
appointing a Portuguese member of the Economic and Social Committee
(2001/175/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 258 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 166 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 15 September 1998 appointing the members of the Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 1998 to 20 September 2002(1),
Whereas a members seat on that Committee has fallen vacant following the resignation of Mr Manuel António ARAÚJO DOS SANTOS, of which the Council was informed on 14 September 2000,
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the Portuguese Government,
Having obtained the opinion of the Commission of the European Communities,
main_body: Mr Alfredo Manuel VIEIRA CORREIA is hereby appointed a member of the Economic and Social Committee in place of Mr Manuel António ARAÚJO DOS SANTOS for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 20 September 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 February 2001.
For the Council
The President
A. Lindh
(1) OJ L 257, 19.9.1998, p. 37.
